name: webpcss
description: postcss processor for prepare css to use webp images

scripts.mocha: istanbul test node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report html -- --compilers js:babel-core/register --timeout 8000 test/*_spec.js --reporter spec
scripts.test: npm run eslint && npm run mocha
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report html --report lcovonly -- --compilers js:babel-core/register  test/*_spec.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | node ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.precommit: npm run prettier && npm test && npm run compile
scripts.release: npm test && standard-version && git push --follow-tags origin master --no-verify && npm publish
